Conditions for Exchange:
1. The product must be unused, unworn, unwashed and without any flaws. 2. The product must include the original tags, user manual and all accessories. 3. The product must be returned in the original and undamaged manufacturer packaging / box. It must be returned in the same condition with return shipping label attached. Do not put tape or stickers on the manufacturers box 4. You can exchange within 7 days.
5. Burned Product or Product damaged with misuse is not claimable for exchange.
Shipping policy: Flat Rs. 200 Will be Charged for Delivery Delivery will take 5 to 7 working days, in sale days delivery time may vary.

Exchange Policy:
You can exchange any thing which you received with in 7 days from date you receive parcel, delivery us by any of your convenient nearest courier company. Please make sure which items you want to exchange its should be well packed as you received broken or as it is you received with out our permission used items can not be exchange or refund, Courier company return charges paid by customer.

Order Cancel Policy:
Etree.pk Reserve the rights to cancel any order without prior notice.
